metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text:
Banchan
• Ingredients:
o Assorted small side dishes like pickled radish, spinach, bean sprouts, kimchi
• Instructions:
o Prepare each side dish separately.
o Arrange on small plates.
o Serve as accompaniments to the main meal.
Banh Beo

Antipasto
• Ingredients:
o Assorted cured meats (salami, prosciutto)
o Cheeses (mozzarella, provolone)
o Olives
o Marinated vegetables (artichokes, peppers)
o Breadsticks
• Instructions:
o Arrange meats, cheeses, olives, and vegetables on a platter.
o Serve with breadsticks.
Arancini

Fattoush
• Ingredients:
o 2 pita breads
o 4 tomatoes
o 1 cucumber
o 1 small red onion
o 1/4 cup parsley
o 1/4 cup mint
o 1/4 cup lemon juice
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1 teaspoon sumac
o 1 teaspoon salt
• Instructions:
o Toast pita breads until crispy, then break into pieces.
o Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion.
o Mix vegetables with chopped parsley and mint.
o Whisk lemon juice, olive oil, sumac, and salt, then pour over salad.
o Toss well and serve.
Fava

Salade Niçoise
• Ingredients:
o 4 tomatoes
o 1 cucumber
o 1 small red onion
o 1/4 cup olives
o 1/4 cup green beans
o 2 hard-boiled eggs
o 1 can tuna
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar
o 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard
o 1 teaspoon salt
• Instructions:
o Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion.
o Blanch green beans until tender.
o Arrange tomatoes, cucumber, onion, green beans, olives, and tuna on a plate.
o Quarter hard-boiled eggs and add to the salad.
o Whisk olive oil, vinegar, mustard, and salt, then drizzle over the salad.
o Toss gently and serve.
Salpicão

Almond Butter and Apple Slices
Ingredients:
• 1 apple, sliced
• 2 tablespoons almond butter
Instructions:
• Spread almond butter on each apple slice.
• Serve immediately.
